Other OrdersÂ¶

The Other Orders feature allows the admin to:

  1. Upload - upload other order files from a hospital or client EHR system that can be processed to provide valid and invalid procedures.
  1. Contents - view Valid,invalid and On Hold procedure data and send to the provider for review.
  1. Review - list files that have been assigned for review and their status.
  1. Export -
